hero.title: Marwin John Gonzales
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer & Tech Enthusiast
hero.description: Building exceptional digital experiences with modern technologies. Passionate about creating innovative solutions that make a difference.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Your friendly neighborhood developer
bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer currently studying at Asia Pacific College. I love building things that live on the internet, whether that's websites, applications, or anywhere in between.
My journey in tech started with curiosity and has evolved into a passion for creating innovative solutions. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and tackle challenging problems.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new tech trends, participating in hackathons, or contributing to open-source projects.
